AD_DURATION.description: An aria label for the ad countdown element that shows how long the current ad is going to last.

AD_PROGRESS.description: The contents of the ad countdown element, describing what ad you are on in a sequence of ads.

AD_STATISTICS.description: Label for a button that displays ad statistics.

AD_TIME.description: The text content of a label that shows how much time is left in the current ad.

AIRPLAY.description: Label for a button used to open the native AirPlay dialog in the browser and select a destination to AirPlay to.

AUTO_QUALITY.description: Label for a button used to allow the video player to select the resolution/quality of the video automatically.

BACK.description: Label for a button used to return to the previous menu in the video player's settings.

CAPTIONS.description: Label for a button used to navigate to a submenu to choose captions/subtitles in the video player.

CAST.description: Label for a button used to open the native Cast dialog in the browser and select a destination to Cast to.

CHAPTERS.description: Label for a button used to open a submenu to choose a chapter.

DOWNLOAD_VIDEO_FRAME.description: Label for a button used to download the current video frame.

ENTER_LOOP_MODE.description: Label for a button that controls the loop mode of a video player. This mode will loop (play over and over) currently selected video.

ENTER_PICTURE_IN_PICTURE.description: Label for a button used to enter Picture-in-Picture mode in a video player.  This mode will float the video on top of the user's desktop and allow them to continue viewing while using other applications.

EXIT_FULL_SCREEN.description: Label for a button used to exit full screen mode in the video player.

EXIT_LOOP_MODE.description: Label for a button that exits the loop mode of a video player.

EXIT_PICTURE_IN_PICTURE.description: Label for a button used to exit Picture-in-Picture mode in a video player.  This will bring the video back into the web page, rather than floating on top of the user's desktop.

FAST_FORWARD.description: Label for a button used to play video at a higher rate than normal.

FULL_SCREEN.description: Label for a button used to enter full screen mode in the video player.

LANGUAGE.description: Label for a button used to navigate to a submenu to choose the audio language in the video player.

LIVE.description: Label to indicate that a video is already playing at the live broadcast.

LOOP.description: The text content of a name label for the loop button.

MORE_SETTINGS.description: Label for a button used to open a menu with additional settings in the video player.

MULTIPLE_LANGUAGES.description: Label for a button used to select an audio track which contains content in multiple languages.

MUTE.description: Label for a button used to mute the sound in the video player.

NOT_APPLICABLE.description: Label for a button used to select an audio track for which language is not applicable, such as content without spoken words.

OFF.description: Title beneath a button showing that this feature of the video player is not currently enabled.  Currently used for Cast, Picture-in-Picture, and Captions/Subtitles, but could apply to other features in the future.

ON.description: Title beneath a button showing that this feature of the video player is current enabled.  Currently used for Picture-in-Picture, but could apply to other features in the future.

PAUSE.description: Label for a button used to pause a video in the video player.

PICTURE_IN_PICTURE.description: Label for a button used to control the Picture-in-Picture mode of a video player.  This mode will float the video on top of the user's desktop and allow them to continue viewing while using other applications.

PLAY.description: Label for a button used to play or unpause video in a video player.

PLAYBACK_RATE.description: Label for a button used to navigate to a submenu to choose the playback speed in the video player.

QUALITY.description: Label for a button used to open a submenu to choose audio quality in the video player.

RECENTER_VR.description: Label for a button used to recenter the VR view.

REPLAY.description: Label for a button used to replay the video in a video player.

RESOLUTION.description: Label for a button used to open a submenu to choose a video resolution in the video player.

REWIND.description: Label for a button used to rewind video by seeking repeatedly backward.

SEEK.description: Label for a slider used to show progress or seek to a particular time in a video.

SKIP_AD.description: The title of the Skip Ad button, that skips currently playing ad, when clicked.

SKIP_TO_LIVE.description: Label for a button used to skip ahead to the live broadcast.

SKIP_NEXT.description: Label for a button used to skip next.

STATISTICS.description: Label for a button that displays statistics of the video.

SUBTITLE_FORCED.description: Label used to identify a subtitle track that is forced to be shown.

SURROUND.description: Label used to identify a audio track that has surround audio.

TOGGLE_STEREOSCOPIC.description: Label for a button that toggle between monoscopic and stereoscopic.

UNDETERMINED_LANGUAGE.description: Label for a button used to select an audio track whose language is undetermined or unknown.

UNMUTE.description: Label for a button used to unmute the sound in the video player.

UNRECOGNIZED_LANGUAGE.description: Label for a button used to select an audio language whose language code we do not recognize.  This will be followed by the language code in parentheses.  For example, "Unrecognized (sjn)".

VOLUME.description: Label for a slider used to set the volume level of the video player.
